EnginesAdd.icc File Reference

Edit to add new engine. More...

This graph shows which files directly or indirectly include this file:

Go to the source code of this file.

Functions

_writeEngineList push_back (new HitWriteEngine(this))

Detailed Description

Edit to add new engine.

To activate a new engine you have to add a line like the following in this file:

 _writeEngineList.push_back( new MyNewEngineName(this) );

You also have to edit the file engines/EnginesInclude.icc.

Definition in file EnginesAdd.icc.
